overview: Victor has more than 25 years of global sales, marketing and business development experience. He is currently Vice President of Sales & Business Development for VC-backed software company, TransCella. TransCella has developed the world’s best Binary Translator and Automatic Parallelizer. Using only binary files (EXE, DLLs, etc.), TransCella’s technology can transform existing Win/X86 software applications into multi-threaded versions that take full advantage of all the advanced instructions in the users CPU as well as the multiple cores. Prior to this he was Vice President of Worldwide Sales & Marketing for Nanosys, Inc., where he played a key role in establishing the company’s strategic partnerships with nano-materials enabling high color gamut LED back lighting for flat panel displays, and breakthrough energy storage capacity in Li+ batteries. Prior to this, Victor held a variety of leadership roles at a variety of high technology companies including NeoAccel (acquired by VMware), as Vice President of Sales, where he championed the OEM Sales for the company’s high performance SSL VPN products. Prior to that Victor was VP of Asia Sales, where he secured many key customers for SMaL Camera’s HDR range image sensors. As VP of Business Development for VVL (acquired by STMicro) he was responsible for many new image sensor design-ins. As VP of Market Development for OmniVision, he drove the customer engagements across many disparate markets. Victor began his career as a Materials Engineer for the Advanced Reactor Systems Dept. at General Electric. Victor studied Electrical and Computer Engineering at U.C. Davis.
